column2: "Na ahomgyeda no twaa mu no
column3: Mary Magdalene nye James ne na Mary nye Salome
column4: tɔɔ nduhuam dɛ wɔdze rokɔ akɛsera no."

column2: "Na da a odzi dapɛn no kan no n’anapatutuitu na wɔkɔr nda no do
"Na wɔsesee hɔnho dɛ
column3: Woana bepirew ɔbo no efi nda no ano ama hɛn?"

column2: "Na wɔtoo hɔn enyi no wohun dɛ woepirew ɔbo no efi hɔ: osiandɛ ɔso kɛsenara."
"Na wɔhɛɛn nda no mu no
column3: wohun aberantsɛ bi a ɔtse nyimfa hyɛ atar fufuw tsentsen

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Mma hom mmbɔ hu: hom rohwehwɛ Jesus Nazarɛtnyi a wɔbɔɔ no mbeamudua mu no; Ɔasoɛr: onnyi ha. Hwɛ mbrɛ wɔdze no toe!"

column2: "Na hom nkɔ nkɛka nkyerɛ n’esuafo no
column5: Oedzi hom enyim kɔ Galilii: hɔ na hom bohu no

column2: "Na wofiir edzi fiir nda no ho guanee
column3: na ahopopo nye ahobow kaa hɔn

column2: "[Na ɔsoɛɛr da a odzi dapɛn no kan no anapatutuitu no
column3: odzii kan yii noho kyerɛɛ Mary Magdalene a otuu mbɔnsam esuon fii no mu no."
column4: "# 16.9-20  Tsetse akyerɛwfo no bi mmfa ofi nkyekyɛmu 9-20 yi nnka ho."

column2: "Na ɔkɔree kɛkaa kyerɛɛ hɔn a wɔnye no tsenae a woridzi nkɔmbɔ na worusu no."
"Na hɔn dze wɔtsee dɛ ɔtse ase na oehu no no
"Na n’ekyir no woyii no wɔ suban fofor mu kyerɛɛ hɔn mu beenu a wɔnam rokɔ ekuraase;"
"na hɔn so kɔree kɛkaa kyerɛɛ nkaa no; na wɔanngye hɔn so enndzi."
"N’ekyir no a dubiako no tse edzidzi no
column4: na otwuuw hɔn enyim wɔ hɔn ekyingye nye hɔn akoma dzen ntsi
column5: osiandɛ wɔanngye hɔn a wohun no dɛ ɔasoɛr no enndzi."

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom nkɔ wiadze nyinara nkɛka asɛmpa no nkyerɛ abɔdze nyina."

column2: "Nyia ɔgye dzi na wonuma no no
"Na nsɛnkyerɛdze yi bɛka hɔn a wɔgye dzi do: wɔnam me dzin do botu mbɔnsam; wɔbɛkasa kasa fofor;"
"wɔbɛma nwɔ do
column3: na sɛ wɔnom bɔr biara a
column4: ɔrennyɛ hɔn hwee; wɔdze hɔn nsa bogu ayarfo do na hɔn ho ayɛ hɔn dzen."

column2: "Na afei Ewuradze Jesus kasaa kyerɛɛ hɔn ekyir no
"Na hɔn dze
column3: wofii hɔ kɔree kɛkaa asɛm no wɔ mbea nyina
column5: na ɔdze nsɛnkyerɛdze hyɛɛ asɛm no dzen.] Amen."
column6: "#16.20 Tsetse akyerɛwfo no binom mmfa Amen no nnsɔw do."
